list.abs: 干细胞（stem cell）（Stem cell）即起源细胞，是一类具有自我更新和分化潜能的细胞。在细胞的分化过程中，细胞往往由于高度分化而完全失去 …
血液细胞是由骨髓里的造血干细胞（Stem cells）不断地繁殖与分化制造出来。所谓「血液干细胞」即是指具有繁殖与分化能力的造 …

脑干(brain stem)上接大脑、背靠小脑、尾侧与脊髓相连、前侧依次分为中脑、脑桥、延髓。小脑和脑干所夹空间称为第四脑室。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English stemn, stefn, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch stam and German Stamm. Sense 4 is related to Dutch steven, German Steven
Middle English (in the sense 'to stop, delay'): from Old Norse stemma, of Germanic origin. The skiing term (early 20th cent.) is from the German verb stemmen

encyclopedia.content: MATLAB函数stem函数功能 在matlab中，stem函数用于绘制火柴梗图。stem英文有“锛埞ぞ叩娘級柄，把，杆，茎，锛埵黠級干，锛堃讹級柄的意思。 在matlab的命令窗口中输入doc stem或者help stem就可以获得该函数的帮助信息。 调用格式 stem(Y) stem(X,Y) stem(...,'fill') stem(...,LineSpec) stem(axes_handle,...) h = stem(...) 各种格式详细说明请参阅matlab帮助文档。 相关函数 plot、ezplot、line、figure、set、bar、stairs程

entry.def: If a condition or problem stems from something, it was caused originally by that thing.

example.ex: All my problems stem from drink...
example.tran: 我所有的问题都源于酗酒。

example.ex: Much of the instability stems from the economic effects of the war.
example.tran: 不稳定局面多半是由战争对经济的影响造成的。

entry.def: If you stem something, you stop it spreading, increasing, or continuing.

example.ex: Austria has sent three army battalions to its border with Hungary to stem the flow of illegal immigrants...
example.tran: 奥地利已派出 3 个营的兵力去本国和匈牙利交界的边境地区阻止非法移民的流入。

example.ex: The authorities seem powerless to stem the rising tide of violence...
example.tran: 当局似乎无力阻止愈演愈烈的暴力活动。

entry.def: The stem of a plant is the thin, upright part on which the flowers and leaves grow.

example.ex: He stooped down, cut the stem for her with his knife and handed her the flower.
example.tran: 他弯下腰，用刀替她将花茎割断，然后将花递给她。

entry.def: The stem of a wine glass is the long thin part which connects the bowl to the base.
The stem of a pipe is the long thin part through which smoke is sucked.

example.ex: He chewed the stem of his pipe and eyed her sceptically.
example.tran: 他嘴里衔着烟斗柄，满腹狐疑地打量着她。

entry.def: In grammar, the stem of a word is the main part of it, which does not change when the ending changes.
If something happens from stem to stern on a boat, it involves the whole of the boat.

example.ex: A South African television report said the ship was ablaze from stem to stern.
example.tran: 南非一则电视新闻报道称，那艘船从头到尾都着了火。

means.word_mean: 1. (linguistics) the form of a word after all affixes are removed;

sentences.sentence: "thematic vowels are part of the stem"

means.word_mean: 2. a slender or elongated structure that supports a plant or fungus or a plant part or plant organ
3. cylinder forming a long narrow part of something
4. the tube of a tobacco pipe
5. front part of a vessel or aircraft;

sentences.sentence: "he pointed the bow of the boat toward the finish line"

means.word_mean: 6. a turn made in skiing; the back of one ski is forced outward and the other ski is brought parallel to it

Sentence.sentence: The humanities and STEM subjects should be given equal importance.
Recently, the UK National Stem Cell Network warned the UK could lose its place among the world leaders in stem cell research unless adequate funding and legislation could be assured.
Recently, the UK National Stem Cell Network warned the UK could lose its place among the world leaders in stem cell research unless adequate funding and legislation could be assured.

In the America of our own time, the great educational challenge has become an effort to strengthen the teaching of what is now known as the STEM disciplines (science, technology, engineering, and math).
